codelist.name: ActivityDateType
codelist.description: Types of date for activities

codelist.name: ActivityStatus
codelist.description: Lifecycle status of the activity from pipeline to completion

codelist.name: ActivityScope
codelist.description: Geographic scope of activity

codelist.name: AidType
codelist.description: DAC/CRS classification used to distinguish aid modalities.

codelist.name: BudgetIdentifier
codelist.description: IATI Functional and Administrative Common Code : One of several possible Budget Identifier Vocabularies

codelist.name: Country
codelist.description: ISO 3166 alpha 2 Country codes

codelist.name: CollaborationType
codelist.description: DAC/CRS classification used to determine the character of resource flows (bilateral or multilateral).

codelist.name: ContactType
codelist.description: Type of Contact

codelist.name: Currency
codelist.description: ISO 4217 Currency used for all transactions and budgets

codelist.name: DescriptionType
codelist.description: Activity decription types. (General, objectives, etc)

codelist.name: DocumentCategory
codelist.description: Categories of information included in published documents

codelist.name: FileFormat
codelist.description: File format of published documents

codelist.name: FinanceType
codelist.description: DAC/CRS transaction classification used to distinguish financial instruments, e.g. grants or loans.

codelist.name: FlowType
codelist.description: DAC/CRS distinction between ODA (official development assistance) and other types of resource flow.

codelist.name: GazetteerAgency
codelist.description: An online resource that holds coordinates and descriptions of geographic locations

codelist.name: GeographicalPrecision
codelist.description: A system for clarifying the accuracy and usage of geographical coordinates

codelist.name: Language
codelist.description: To specify the language of titles, descriptions and documents

codelist.name: LoanRepaymentType
codelist.description: used in additional CRS elements

codelist.name: LoanRepaymentPeriod
codelist.description: CRS Loan Repayment No of Payments

codelist.name: OrganisationIdentifier
codelist.description: This list is composed of the three separate lists on the original IATI site.

codelist.name: SectorCategory
codelist.description: The categories of DAC Sector codes

codelist.name: TransactionType
codelist.description: Added 3 new options to the codelist: QP - Purchase of Equity, QS - Sale of Equity ,CG - Credit Guarantee

codelist.name: ValueType
codelist.description: A derived enlarged version of TransactionType to include PD (planned Disbursements) and TB (Budget)
